name: You Dig?
description:
Overview

You Dig is a game made for the BrackeysGameJam 2020. The theme of the jam is 'Hole'. 

There are many traps lied ahead thus your job is to overcome them and reach to the end of the game. You dig???

Replay the game as many times you want to get the highest score!

Also screenshot your game score and put it on the comments below :D

And speedrun videos are also well accepted here! :)

Be sure to rate on tha jam page!

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-3/rate/573317
